contest-event.event-date:
April 26, 1987 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B) 20 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-section-b
Civic Hall, Holmfirth March contest - 1st Boarshurst 'B', 2nd Hinchliffe Mill. Hymn tune contest - 1st Meltham and Meltham Mills, 2nd Boarshurst 'B'. 9 bands competed.
April 6, 2012, 8:36 a.m. June 27, 2016, 11 p.m.
1 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Jack Fisher Facets of Glass
2 Boarshurst 'B' Jim Hunter Fanfare Diversions
3 Linthwaite Silver Band John Iredale The Corsair
4 Hinchliffe Mill Band R. Broadhead A Malvern Suite
Unknown Result Honley Silver Band Norman Law
Unknown Result Slaithwaite Band John Grinnell Scottish Festival Overture
Unknown Result Emley Brass Band S. Bennet Overture to Youth
Unknown Result Uppermill Band Harold Robinson Overture to Youth
Unknown Result Marsden Silver Prize Band Tony Jaeger-Fozard Partita [unknown composer]
